job_purpose: Responsible for building, testing, and maintaining software packages to ensure efficient deployment across the organization.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Develop and maintain software packages using SCCM, InstallShield, MSI, and App-V
Test packages in multiple environments for functionality and compatibility
Collaborate with IT teams to manage deployments and resolve deployment-related issues
Provide technical support for application packaging and distribution
Maintain thorough documentation and follow best practice standards
required_qualifications: Experience in software packaging and deployment
Proficiency in SCCM, InstallShield, and scripting tools (PowerShell, VBScript, Python)
Strong knowledge of Windows and Mac operating systems
Strong communication and ability to work in cross-functional teams
preferred_qualifications: Relevant certifications (e.g., Microsoft Modern Desktop Administrator)
company_name: Confidential (Company Name not provided in job description)
company_details: Leading IT environment in Perth on a 6-month contract. Seeking a Software Packaging Administrator to ensure efficient and seamless deployment of software packages.
